ygData.subject: Re: RUN
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She kept running but she was slowing down. She heard a voice on her link, I m Maximal.  She kept running and weaving as she ran. ... stopping ... ground,

::SnowCat::

She kept running but she was slowing down. She heard a voice on her 
link, "I'm Maximal."  She kept running and weaving as she ran.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DeathScythe/Ramulus::
> 
> SnowCat's trick worked, DeathScythe was send flying pase her, 
stopping 
> against a rather large tree when he tried to turn. He falls to the 
ground, 
> jumping up a second later. This was obvioustly not working, a 
different 
> strategy was in order. He jumps upwards, his jets activating again.
> 
> DeathScythe bursts out of the canopy, flying after SnowCat above 
the trees. 
> Now that there were no trees in his way, he was going much faster, 
and his 
> scanners were locked on to SnowCat's signature. The assassin calmly 
flies 
> above the forest, following SnowCat.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus frowns as he runs by a large tree, stopping and looking 
back at it. 
> It was splashed with mechfluid and dented: something obvioustly 
crashed into 
> it, something big. The Maximal checks his scanners. The bot he had 
been 
> following was flying again, and there was a second signature 
running in front 
> of it.
> 
> Ramulus takes off at a gallop for the second signature, activating 
his 
> comm-link.
> 
> "New bot," he says into it, addressing SnowCat, "What's your 
alliegence?"
